Kindly share the area pincode to check the availability of the medicine.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Support Team,

I am writing on behalf of my friend, who recently booked a blood test
through your app. Unfortunately, the phlebotomist who visited mishandled
the sample collection, resulting in internal blood clotting and
considerable pain. This has caused my friend both physical discomfort and
unnecessary stress.

This level of negligence is extremely disappointing, especially from a
platform that people rely on for safe and professional healthcare services.

Given the botched procedure, we request a full refund for the test. My
friend will be attaching photographic proof of the injury for your
verification.

Please look into this matter urgently and process the refund at the
earliest. We expect a prompt and responsible resolution.

Thank You,
Saad Khan
On behalf of Aarifa Mushtaq,
Email ID : mushtaqaarifa@gmail.com
Registered Phone No. : +91 9336917770
Order ID : 6216611

Dear PharmEasy Support Team,

I am writing on behalf of my friend, who recently booked a blood test through your app. Unfortunately, the phlebotomist who visited mishandled the sample collection, resulting in internal blood clotting and considerable pain. This has caused my friend both physical discomfort and unnecessary stress.

This level of negligence is extremely disappointing, especially from a platform that people rely on for safe and professional healthcare services.

Given the botched procedure, we request a full refund for the test. My friend will be attaching photographic proof of the injury for your verification.

Please look into this matter urgently and process the refund at the earliest. We expect a prompt and responsible resolution.

Thank You,
Saad Khan
On behalf of Aarifa Mushtaq,
Email ID : mushtaqaarifa@gmail.com
Registered Phone No. : +91 9336917770
Order ID : 6216611

notes.body: Hello Kashish,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your concern raised bout receiving wrong product in your order, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that due to label printing mishap that led to wrong pick and pack.  Please note that the issue was resolved on 27th and Seller has been coached and informed to be vigilant going forward.     PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Kashish,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your concern raised bout receiving wrong product in your order, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.
 
As per update received from our team, please be informed that due to label printing mishap that led to wrong pick and pack.  Please note that the issue was resolved on 27th and Seller has been coached and informed to be vigilant going forward.

PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.
 
Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

 With regards to your order #653290498188378112-18423, I am sorry to know you have not received the medicine you ordered, DYDROGEST 10MG STRIP OF 10 TABLETS quantities of 2. This is certainly not the kind of experience that we wanted you to have with our services. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you.

out of stock and a refund of ₹154.95 was processed, which I have received.
However, the remaining medicines in the order are marked as “Delivered” in
your app, but the package has not been received by us.

Please find the invoice attached for your reference.

This is a serious concern because the medicines were ordered for my
grandmother, who is dependent on them for her daily treatment. She has been
waiting for these medicines, and any delay or missed dose can seriously
affect her health.

1. Immediately investigate this delivery issue.


2. Arrange a replacement delivery at the earliest or issue a full refund if
the order cannot be delivered.

notes.body: Hello Prashant,     Greetings from PharmEasy!    I see that your order #654544094751334400 was assigned for a free consultation with our tie-up doctor. As per the records, your order has been cancelled by our partnered doctor because you have refused for a teleconsultation. I am sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.     Please be informed that we are unable to modify the order details or conatct details once the order is placed.   I request you to place a new order with with required modifications or a valid prescription to avoid a doctor's consultation. You can also opt for a free consultation at the time of placing the order. Also, I request you to kindly get back to us if the doctor has cancelled the order wrongly.   You may visit the link mentioned below for clarification.  https://pharmeasy.in/help/doctor-consultation-43000550954/why-was-a-doctor-consultation-arranged-for-my-order--43000487599     I see the refund of Rs. 1858.17 was initiated on 2nd December 2025. It will be credited to your original payment source within 5 to 7 working days. You can track your refund via ARN number: 533604775591.     Please note: Saturday, Sunday, and public holidays will not be included in business days. Refund timelines depend on Bank turnaround times. I appreciate your patience and understanding in the meantime.  For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Prashant,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I see that your order #654544094751334400 was assigned for a free consultation with our tie-up doctor. As per the records, your order has been cancelled by our partnered doctor because you have refused for a teleconsultation. I am sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.

Please be informed that we are unable to modify the order details or conatct details once the order is placed.

I request you to place a new order with with required modifications or a valid prescription to avoid a doctor's consultation. You can also opt for a free consultation at the time of placing the order. Also, I request you to kindly get back to us if the doctor has cancelled the order wrongly.

You may visit the link mentioned below for clarification.
https://pharmeasy.in/help/doctor-consultation-43000550954/why-was-a-doctor-consultation-arranged-for-my-order--43000487599

I see the refund of Rs. 1858.17 was initiated on 2nd December 2025. It will be credited to your original payment source within 5 to 7 working days. You can track your refund via ARN number: 533604775591.

Please note: Saturday, Sunday, and public holidays will not be included in business days. Refund timelines depend on Bank turnaround times. I appreciate your patience and understanding in the meantime.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Regards,
Habiba

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Excellent Quality Scientific & Laboratory Equipment - Best Price Deals
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hi,

I am Nick Keating of Nova Medical Solutions located in Ohio, United States.

We supply Scientific & Laboratory Equipment used in the Biotechnology, Medical, Biopharmaceutical, Analytical, Environmental, Drug Development, Research and Life Science industries.

We currently have available: Gas Chromatographs (GC), Mass Spectrometers, Liquid Handlers, High-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC), Imaging & Diagnostic Systems, DNA Sequencers, Bio-reactors, Chemistry Analyzers, Freezers, Robotic Surgery Systems and more for sale at competitive prices.

Kindly see below what is in stock and let me know which are of interest to you and I will provide additional information and photos.

6539961177600-95494 ( Invoice No. 520312825A597592) ,  we received above

are astonished how it has happened with Pharmeasy!  Of  course we are
regretfully share our very bad experiences in relation to the un-  timely
delivery of medicines this time also   like it happened in  earlier
occassions  . And now damaged/ used packets are also being supplied ! Very
disastrous condition while the supply is  related with medicines like
essentials. Please replace the same immediately  with a genuine and packed
unused medicine of same brand on taking return of the said defective
packet. Moreover your second despatch of medicine has also not reached
inspite of your clear  commitment to deliver the same by this evening . We
may  really  be constrained to take decision to discontinue ordering the
medicines with Pharmeasy. Please acknowledge the receipt for your prompt

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Sir,

Hello, I am a very old and loyal customer of your platform. Initially, I
used to order medicines from a different account, but I have continued to
trust and rely on your services for a long time.

A few days ago, I faced something very surprising and frankly shocking. I
ordered three products together, and one of them was Lactocalamine, which
was supposed to include a free sunscreen. However, the free sunscreen was
missing. This product may be worth only a few rupees, but the issue is far
more serious.

It is clear that the vendor knowingly sent this incomplete product, taking
advantage of the fact that it is marked as non-returnable. They assume
customers will not raise complaints, and unfortunately, such practices
ultimately damage the reliability and trust of your platform.

Even after raising a complaint through customer care, a query/ticket
(ticket no #22237477) was generated, and I was told I would be contacted
later. Without any communication, the ticket was closed, which was very
disappointing.

The free product may cost only a few rupees, but the issue here is not the
price it is the vendor’s deliberate negligence and misuse of the
non-returnable clause. As a responsible platform, I request you to take
strict action against the vendor and your customer care team who is dealing
with it and ensure such incidents do not happen again.

Thank you for your attention. I hope PharmEasy will uphold its reputation
and customer trust by addressing this matter seriously.

PS: Attaching all the necessary documents

Regards,

--

notes.body: Hello Akhilesh,    Greetings from PharmEasy!  We understand your concern in regard to order #653396276078682112-69585.       As checked, a complaint was raised for the issue. PharmEasy wishes to provide the best service to its customers. It was never our intention to disappoint you by any means, and we apologise for the same. We hope to serve you better ahead.      Rs. 50 was credited to your PharmEasy wallet. To check your PharmEasy Wallet balance, go to the accounts section and click on the Wallet section to see the balance amount. This amount will expire on 29.05.2026 at 11:59 PM.     If you still wish to return the item, please contact us, and we will help with the same. Item(s) that are opened, partially used, or disfigured are not eligible for returns. Items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.    For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.  Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.  Regards, Grievance Officer HelpDesk.
notes.body_html:
Hello Akhilesh,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We understand your concern in regard to order #653396276078682112-69585.  

As checked, a complaint was raised for the issue. PharmEasy wishes to provide the best service to its customers. It was never our intention to disappoint you by any means, and we apologise for the same. We hope to serve you better ahead. 
 
Rs. 50 was credited to your PharmEasy wallet. To check your PharmEasy Wallet balance, go to the accounts section and click on the Wallet section to see the balance amount. This amount will expire on 29.05.2026 at 11:59 PM.

If you still wish to return the item, please contact us, and we will help with the same. Item(s) that are opened, partially used, or disfigured are not eligible for returns. Items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact. 

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

Regards,
Grievance Officer HelpDesk.

notes.body_html:
Hi Team, 

I am still waiting for my order. Could you please provide me with the current status?

The medicine should have been delivered on time but it been already been passed 14 days since the this was ordered. This is my second time when order has been delayed, and I have not been informed of the reason.

The service from the Pharmeasy is becoming increasingly poor, and I see a complete lack of accountability.

Regards,
Deepak


On Wed, 3 Dec, 2025, 8:10 am Grievance Officer, <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
Hello Deepak,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We have already highlighted your concern. We are trying our best to resolve the issue as soon as possible. We will notify you once we get a further update. We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.

Regards,
Grievance Officer HelpDesk.

notes.body: Hello Deepak,     Thank you for writing in.     Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience caused to you due to the delay in resolving your concern. We truly understand your concern and disappointment caused to you. This is not the service we would like to give to our customers. Due to operational challenges at the courier partner’s end, a delay occurred in the order. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.           Regards, Grievance Officer HelpDesk.
notes.body_html:
Hello Deepak,

Thank you for writing in.

Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience caused to you due to the delay in resolving your concern. We truly understand your concern and disappointment caused to you. This is not the service we would like to give to our customers. Due to operational challenges at the courier partner’s end, a delay occurred in the order. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.        

Regards,
Grievance Officer HelpDesk.

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We have received an update from our Logistics team that your order has been delivered to you. We hope you have received the same today. We apologise for the inconvenience caused to you and hope to serve you better ahead.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Webinar on 

Next-Level Negotiation Skills

Mastering High-Stakes Deals with Power & Precision

On

4th December 2025

11:00 am to 04:30 pm


Objective:-

*     Develop elite-level strategies to handle high-stakes deals with
confidence.

*     Master advanced techniques in persuasion, influence, and power
dynamics.

*     Learn to identify and counter aggressive negotiation tactics.

*     Practice real-world negotiation scenarios with direct coaching and
feedback. 

Who should Attend:

*     Sales teams & procurement professionals

*     Business leaders & executives

*     Entrepreneurs & business owners

*     Legal & contract managers

*     Anyone handling high-stakes negotiations

Contents

*   The Psychology of Hardcore Negotiation 

*    Overview of the different negotiation styles: Soft, Tactical, and
Hardcore

*    Psychological biases that influence decision-making

*    Power dynamics and how to leverage perception and authority

*    Practical strategies to shift from a weak to a powerful negotiating
position

*   High-Stakes Negotiation Tactics & Counter-Tactics 

*     "First Offer Advantage" and strategic anchoring techniques

*    Framing, re-framing, and leveraging the "Decoy Effect" to control
outcomes

*    How to deal with "Hardball" negotiators and defend against dirty
tactics

*    Tactical concessions, trade-offs, and the "If-Then" strategy for
managing give-and-take

*   Real-World Negotiation Simulations

*    Negotiating a multi-million-dollar contract: Participants assume roles
of buyer, seller, CFO, and legal advisor.

*    Rapid-fire negotiation rounds: Quick 3-minute negotiation exercises
with different partners to hone adaptability and decision-making.

*   Closing the Deal & Advanced Negotiation Techniques

*    Closing strategies: When to walk away vs. when to push for a better
deal

*    The "Deal Sweetener" technique to extract final concessions

*    Identifying hidden opportunities during the final moments of a
negotiation

*    Group Challenge: Negotiating against a difficult buyer with hidden
objectives to test adaptability and strategic thinking

*   Q&A and recap: Key Strategies, Challenges and Solutions Discussed


Pre-requisites

You should have good internet connection and good quality headphone/speaker
set with Laptop / Desktop.

You should have notepad/pen to note down important points.


How To Register 


Fee Structure: - Per participant

Rs. 4500/-

USD 81

----18% GST is applicable

> Fees include certificate of participation & Course Material.

*Terms & Conditions apply 

 

Best regards

For GFORD Institute of Management Pvt Ltd

Ajay Arora

For Booking seats Email us : gfordseminar@outlook.com 

Mob. : 9711114779 / 9315556407 

For Query and nominations - 9540012349 only Whatsapp

For unsubscribe from the mailing list, please mail us on
gfordremoving@gmail.com

 


--

notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   I understand that you wish to know the expiry date for your medicines. I am sorry to inform you, at the moment we do not have a feature to show the expiry date while placing the order.    I wish to inform you that we ensure that the shelf life of the medicines being supplied by our partner retailers is, at least a minimum of 3 months from the date of delivery. As per the confirmation from our certified Pharmacist, If the expiry date of the medicine is beyond the 3 months from the expiry, you can consume that medicine.     However, you can view the expiry date on your invoice before the order is delivered.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
I understand that you wish to know the expiry date for your medicines. I am sorry to inform you, at the moment we do not have a feature to show the expiry date while placing the order. 

I wish to inform you that we ensure that the shelf life of the medicines being supplied by our partner retailers is, at least a minimum of 3 months from the date of delivery. As per the confirmation from our certified Pharmacist, If the expiry date of the medicine is beyond the 3 months from the expiry, you can consume that medicine.  

However, you can view the expiry date on your invoice before the order is delivered.
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Asalam,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern regarding the order #654666760714715136-25973. I will surely assist you with the same.     As per the records, your order was cancelled today. I apologise for any inconvenience caused to you with your order.     Also, I understand that you are unable to select Cash on Delivery as your preferred payment option. Please note that the inapplicability of COD can depend on several factors, such as the types of medicines ordered, delivery location, supplier's location, etc.     Currently, the Cash on Delivery option is unavailable for this pincode 233002. For future orders, if the COD option becomes available, it will be visible in the payment methods section on both the App and Website.     I request you to use the online payment modes option from the App/ Website. Also, you can use multiple online payment offers available there, through which you can save more. notes.body: Hello Babar,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      With regards to your order #654535340214190080-18235, the estimated delivery date is 04th December to 06th December 2025.     I would like to inform you that the estimated date of delivery depends on the availability of the medicines and the delivery pin code. Also, be informed, PharmEasy will always try to ensure that your order is delivered at the earliest, as we completely understand the urgency of the medicine.     As of now, the speed-up delivery feature is unavailable to us. Once the order is out for delivery, you will receive an SMS with the contact details of the delivery executive along with the 4-digit pin. Once the details are shared with you, you may coordinate with the delivery executive for exact timings.     You may also track your order from here https://track.clickpost.in/cs-login?next_url=https://track.clickpost.in/cs-page?waybill=35899335550976&cp_id=105 with the AWB number: 35899335550976.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.  ​   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!     Regards,  Habiba

helpdesk_ticket.description:
I’m writing regarding a recent order for which I had paid ₹1,980 through my Amazon Pay wallet. Interestingly, the order was automatically cancelled and refunded due to a price change of ₹0.18. Yes, eighteen paise.

While I understand systems are automated, I was quite surprised to see that instead of receiving the original ₹1,980, the refunded amount credited back to my wallet was ₹1,960 — a shortfall of ₹20. I’m sure this must be an oversight and not the intended outcome of adjusting an order over a few paise.

I would appreciate it if you could look into this discrepancy and process the remaining ₹20 at the earliest, as I believe refunds should match the exact amount paid — especially when the cancellation was triggered from your end.

Looking forward to a quick resolution.

notes.body: Hello Raj,   Greetings from PharmEasy!   I understand your concern with regard to the order ID 654342200204435456-93354. I will surely assist you with this.  ​   Please be informed that you have applied the coupon code PEAID.   ​   As per the criteria for the coupon code PEAID, you can enjoy 20% off on allopathic medicines. The coupon is applicable when the cart MRP is above Rs. 1750. Additionally, PLUS Members receive an extra 5% PharmEasy Credit.  ​   ​As per the terms and conditions of the coupon code PEAID, you are eligible to receive 20% off, up to a maximum of Rs. 300, on allopathic medicine orders.   ​   I would like to inform you that up to 10% is a product level discount on order. However, you need to apply that coupon code, and then you will get a 20% discount from our side. Kindly note that the benefit of the coupon code has been successfully applied to your order.  ​   We would like to inform you that the total discount on your recent order has been applied as follows:      MRP Discount (12.31%): ₹702.95.  Coupon Discount (5.25%): ₹300.  PharmEasy credit (5%): 235.39   PharmEasy Plus Membership Cashback (4.47%): Applied additionally as cashback.   For further clarification, you may visit the following link:   ​https://pharmeasy.in/help/promotions-43000349470/how-is-the-discount-calculated--43000542784     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.   Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Raj,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand your concern with regard to the order ID 654342200204435456-93354. I will surely assist you with this.
​
Please be informed that you have applied the coupon code PEAID. 
​
As per the criteria for the coupon code PEAID, you can enjoy 20% off on allopathic medicines. The coupon is applicable when the cart MRP is above Rs. 1750. Additionally, PLUS Members receive an extra 5% PharmEasy Credit.
​
​As per the terms and conditions of the coupon code PEAID, you are eligible to receive 20% off, up to a maximum of Rs. 300, on allopathic medicine orders. 
​
I would like to inform you that up to 10% is a product level discount on order. However, you need to apply that coupon code, and then you will get a 20% discount from our side. Kindly note that the benefit of the coupon code has been successfully applied to your order.
​
We would like to inform you that the total discount on your recent order has been applied as follows:

  • MRP Discount (12.31%): ₹702.95.
  • Coupon Discount (5.25%): ₹300.
  • PharmEasy credit (5%): 235.39 
  • PharmEasy Plus Membership Cashback (4.47%): Applied additionally as cashback.
For further clarification, you may visit the following link: 
​https://pharmeasy.in/help/promotions-43000349470/how-is-the-discount-calculated--43000542784

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body_html:
created_by: 43006497081
time: 2025-12-02 02:49:04 UTC

notes.body: Hello Durga,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   With regard to your order #654181615477981184-74757, I see your order has been dispatched and it is being delivered by a courier partner. The estimated delivery date is 08th December 2025.     I would request you reconsider your decision regarding the cancellation of your order. Also, help us with the reason for the same.     Please be informed we are unable to cancel an order once it is dispatched for delivery. If you still wish to cancel your order, you may refuse it at the time of delivery.       If you still wish to cancel your order kindly get back to us we will check and assist you further.     Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello Durga,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
With regard to your order #654181615477981184-74757, I see your order has been dispatched and it is being delivered by a courier partner. The estimated delivery date is 08th December 2025.

I would request you reconsider your decision regarding the cancellation of your order. Also, help us with the reason for the same.

Please be informed we are unable to cancel an order once it is dispatched for delivery. If you still wish to cancel your order, you may refuse it at the time of delivery.  

If you still wish to cancel your order kindly get back to us we will check and assist you further.

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Asked for the confirmation and reason for the cancellation, woc
notes.body_html: Asked for the confirmation and reason for the cancellation, woc

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Bot:  Hi Mohsin,  I am Easybot. I am here to help you with your concern. Bot:  Please state your concerns regarding your order Customer:  mera oder mujhe jaldi nahi mila Bot:   आपके ऑर्डर की शिपमेंट हो चुकी है और इसे 03 दिसंबर 2025 की रात 10 बजे से पहले डिलीवर कर दिया जाएगा। फिलहाल डिलीवरी में कोई देरी नहीं है। आप इस लिंक से अपने ऑर्डर की ट्रैकिंग भी कर सकते हैं: https://pharmeasy.clickpost.in/?waybill=34791155676956&key=cc4ef857-999a-47d9-835a-d63d2f3d0760 
 अगर आप चाहते हैं तो मैं डिलीवरी को जल्दी करने के लिए टिकट भी raise कर सकता हूँ। कृपया बताएं।  Customer:  oder ki mujhe zarurat hai tabiyat bahut kharab hai Bot:   मैं समझ सकता हूँ कि आपकी तबियत खराब है और आपको अपना ऑर्डर जल्द से जल्द चाहिए। आपके ऑर्डर की डिलीवरी 03 दिसंबर 2025 की रात 10 बजे से पहले हो जाएगी, और हम पूरी कोशिश कर रहे हैं कि समय से पहले ही आपको आपका ऑर्डर मिल जाए। 
 क्या मैं आपके ऑर्डर की डिलीवरी को जल्दी करने के लिए एक टिकट raise करूं? कृपया पुष्टि करें ताकि मैं आपकी मदद कर सकूं।  Customer:  ji bilkul Bot:   मैंने डिलीवरी को जल्दी करने के लिए टिकट raise करने की कोशिश की, लेकिन फिलहाल हम आपके ऑर्डर को निर्धारित समय से पहले डिलीवर करने की पूरी कोशिश कर रहे हैं। कृपया थोड़ा और इंतजार करें, आपका ऑर्डर जल्द ही पहुंच जाएगा। 
 अगर आपको और कोई सहायता चाहिए तो कृपया बताएं।  Customer:  aj mil jayega kya oder Bot:   आपका ऑर्डर शिप हो चुका है और इसे 03 दिसंबर 2025 की रात 10 बजे से पहले डिलीवर कर दिया जाएगा। आज ही डिलीवरी संभव नहीं है, लेकिन आप निश्चिंत रहें कि आपका ऑर्डर तय समय से पहले पहुंच जाएगा। 
 अगर आपको और कोई सहायता चाहिए तो कृपया बताएं।  Customer:  oder jaldi nhi milta Bot:   मैं समझता हूँ कि आपको ऑर्डर जल्दी चाहिए। आपके ऑर्डर की डिलीवरी 03 दिसंबर 2025 की रात 10 बजे से पहले सुनिश्चित की गई है। फिलहाल डिलीवरी में कोई देरी नहीं है और हम पूरी कोशिश कर रहे हैं कि आपका ऑर्डर समय पर पहुंचे। 
 अगर आपको लगता है कि डिलीवरी में कोई समस्या है या आपको और सहायता चाहिए, तो कृपया बताएं। मैं आपकी मदद के लिए यहाँ हूँ।  Customer:  golyun ki sakt jarurat hai Bot:   मैं आपकी स्थिति समझता हूँ और आपकी गोलियों की जरूरत को समझता हूँ। कृपया बताएं कि क्या आपने अपना ऑर्डर पहले ही प्लेस कर दिया है? अगर हाँ, तो मैं आपके ऑर्डर की स्थिति चेक कर सकता हूँ ताकि आपको डिलीवरी की जानकारी दे सकूं।  Customer:  ji Bot:   आपका ऑर्डर शिप हो चुका है और इसे 03 दिसंबर 2025 की रात 10 बजे से पहले डिलीवर कर दिया जाएगा। कृपया थोड़ा और इंतजार करें, आपका ऑर्डर जल्द ही पहुंच जाएगा। 
 अगर आपको और कोई सहायता चाहिए तो कृपया बताएं।  Customer:  kitna suna rahi ho appka jawaab sirf 3 december hai mai kya bolu age Bot:   मुझे खेद है कि आपको मेरे जवाब से असुविधा हुई। आपके ऑर्डर की डिलीवरी की तारीख 03 दिसंबर 2025 निर्धारित है, और हम पूरी कोशिश कर रहे हैं कि आपका ऑर्डर समय से पहले पहुंच जाए। फिलहाल, डिलीवरी को और जल्दी करने का कोई निश्चित समय नहीं है। 
 अगर आप चाहें तो मैं आपके ऑर्डर की डिलीवरी को जल्दी करने के लिए एक विशेष अनुरोध (टिकट) फिर से raise कर सकता हूँ। कृपया बताएं क्या मैं ऐसा करूं?  Customer:  ok Bot:   धन्यवाद आपकी पुष्टि के लिए। मैं आपके ऑर्डर की डिलीवरी को जल्दी करने के लिए टिकट raise कर रहा हूँ। कृपया कुछ समय दें, हम आपकी सहायता के लिए पूरी कोशिश करेंगे। 
 अगर आपको और कोई सहायता चाहिए तो कृपया बताएं।  Customer:  ji nahi Bot:   ठीक है, अगर आप भविष्य में किसी भी सहायता की जरूरत महसूस करें तो कृपया बेझिझक बताएं। मैं आपकी मदद के लिए यहाँ हूँ। 
 क्या मैं आपकी और किसी तरह से सहायता कर सकता हूँ?  Customer:  ji Bot:   कृपया बताएं, मैं आपकी किस प्रकार सहायता कर सकता हूँ?  Customer:  tikit raise kar dena Bot:   मैंने आपके ऑर्डर की डिलीवरी को जल्दी करने के लिए टिकट raise करने की कोशिश की, लेकिन फिलहाल हम आपके ऑर्डर को निर्धारित समय से पहले डिलीवर करने की पूरी कोशिश कर रहे हैं। कृपया थोड़ा और इंतजार करें, आपका ऑर्डर जल्द ही पहुंच जाएगा। 
 अगर आपको और कोई सहायता चाहिए तो कृपया बताएं।  Customer:  no Bot:   मैं आपकी बात समझता हूँ। अगर आप चाहें तो मैं आपको कस्टमर केयर से जोड़ सकता हूँ ताकि आपकी समस्या का बेहतर समाधान हो सके। क्या आप कस्टमर केयर से बात करना चाहेंगे?  Customer:  ji Bot:  Thank you for interacting with us. Please select from below options if you need any further help: Customer:  No, I am done Bot:  Thank you for contacting us. For any further assistance, please reach out to us via 'Need help' section.

Thanks

notes.body: ​​​​Hello Rohit,     Greetings from PharmEasy!    I understand you wish to update the number linked to your account.   I am sorry to inform you that we are unable to make any changes to the registered mobile number. Hence, I would request you to create a new account with the active number. I am really sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.   I highly appreciate your understanding in this regard.   For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
​​​​Hello Rohit,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand you wish to update the number linked to your account.

I am sorry to inform you that we are unable to make any changes to the registered mobile number. Hence, I would request you to create a new account with the active number. I am really sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.

I highly appreciate your understanding in this regard.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Regards,
Habiba

On Tue, 2 Dec 2025 at 11:00 AM, PharmEasy <care@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
​​​​Hello Rohit,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

I understand you wish to update the number linked to your account.

I am sorry to inform you that we are unable to make any changes to the registered mobile number. Hence, I would request you to create a new account with the active number. I am really sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.

I highly appreciate your understanding in this regard.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Regards,
Habiba

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha

notes.body: Hello Abhilash,      Greetings from PharmEasy!       With regard to your order #610310863145484288-74210, I understand your query is regarding the billing. Please note that only one patient name can be mentioned on the invoice.     Please be informed that we share invoices in a standard format for all orders. I regret to inform you that we are unable to consolidate both bills into a single invoice.     I would like to inform you that the invoice has been uploaded to the PharmEasy app/website. This invoice can be used for tax or insurance purposes.     We sincerely appreciate your understanding in this matter.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Abhilash,

Greetings from PharmEasy!  

With regard to your order #610310863145484288-74210, I understand your query is regarding the billing. Please note that only one patient name can be mentioned on the invoice.

Please be informed that we share invoices in a standard format for all orders. I regret to inform you that we are unable to consolidate both bills into a single invoice.

I would like to inform you that the invoice has been uploaded to the PharmEasy app/website. This invoice can be used for tax or insurance purposes.

We sincerely appreciate your understanding in this matter.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Subham Das,    Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #654380277006647296-35289.      We can see that your order was canceled on 02nd December 2025. Due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     We would request you to place a new order and we will ensure the order is delivered to you on priority.     Be rest assured as we have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. Looking forward to delighting you soon.     If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. notes.body_html:
Hello Subham Das,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #654380277006647296-35289. 
 
We can see that your order was canceled on 02nd December 2025. Due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.
 
We would request you to place a new order and we will ensure the order is delivered to you on priority.
 
Be rest assured as we have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. Looking forward to delighting you soon.
 
If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

notes.body: Hello Ashok,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     Regarding your order #648610009854029824-26352, we would like to inform you that a return request has already been raised for one quantity of ETHIGLO PLUS TABLETS 60'S . Our records indicate that the medication was picked up on December 04, 2025.     Upon returning the medicine, our partner retailer at the store will verify it. The refund process will then commence and be completed within 5 business days. Additionally, once the refund is initiated, it will be reflected in your bank account within 5-7 business days.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime. Once the return process has been completed, we kindly request that you reach out to us again to initiate a new return request.     If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Ashok,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

Regarding your order #648610009854029824-26352, we would like to inform you that a return request has already been raised for one quantity of ETHIGLO PLUS TABLETS 60'S . Our records indicate that the medication was picked up on December 04, 2025.

Upon returning the medicine, our partner retailer at the store will verify it. The refund process will then commence and be completed within 5 business days. Additionally, once the refund is initiated, it will be reflected in your bank account within 5-7 business days.

We appreciate your patience in the meantime. Once the return process has been completed, we kindly request that you reach out to us again to initiate a new return request.

If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Raghav,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #653314790905085952-90046, as checked the return request is already raised for medicine from your order. As per the records, the medicines are picked up on 08 December 2025.     As the medicine has been  returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days.      We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Raghav,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #653314790905085952-90046, as checked the return request is already raised for medicine from your order. As per the records, the medicines are picked up on 08 December 2025.

As the medicine has been  returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days. 

We appreciate your patience in the meantime.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, on the App or website, listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: The doctor called and consulted for the prescription-required medicine. The doctor informed the patient that the RABIUM DSR STRIP OF 15 CAPSULES medicine was unavailable and recommended for an alternative RABALKEM DSR STRIP OF 10 CAPSULES medicine of the same composition. helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Customer Care Team,

I am writing this email to express my serious dissatisfaction with the
extremely poor and irresponsible service provided by your team regarding my
diagnostic order.

Order ID: 6219623
Sample Collected: 1st December
Committed Report Delivery Time: 2nd December, 2:30 AM
Actual Status: Still not delivered

Despite assuring on-time delivery, the reports have not been provided even
long after the committed deadline. This delay is absolutely unacceptable,
especially when it concerns a patient’s health and timely diagnosis. Your
team’s fake promises and lack of accountability show complete negligence
towards patient safety.

Because of this delay, the purpose of the test is completely lost.

I demand the following actions immediately:

1. Immediate release of the pending lab reports without any further delay.


2. Full refund for the order, since the service was not delivered within
the promised timeline.


3. An explanation for the delay and the steps being taken to ensure this
does not happen again.



I have already been patient enough, but your team is not understanding the
seriousness of the situation. Such poor service from a healthcare platform
is shocking and completely unprofessional.

I request you to treat this as a priority escalation and resolve it at the
earliest.

Awaiting your urgent action.

Regards,
Akash kamthe

The diagnostic report was released only after repeated follow-ups and was
not delivered within the promised timeline, despite my clear request for

notes.body_html:
Dear PharmEasy Team,

I am extremely disappointed with the service provided for my recent order. The diagnostic report was released only after repeated follow-ups and was not delivered within the promised timeline, despite my clear request for timely delivery from the beginning.

Due to this delay, me and my family suffered while taking important medical decisions, and the late report is now of no use. Your team failed to understand the seriousness of the situation, which is unacceptable for a healthcare service provider.

Since the delay was entirely from your end, I request you to process a full refund immediately as compensation and share the confirmation at the earliest.

Kindly treat this as urgent.

Regards,
Akash kamthe
